mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERED (ORDERUSERID, TOTALPRICE, ORDERENROLL, CUSTOMERNAME, RECEIVERNAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, PHONE, ORDERID, FEE) VALUES (#{ orderuserid }, #{ totalprice }, SYSDATE, #{ customername }, #{ receivername }, #{ address1 }, #{ address2 }, #{ phone }, #{ orderid }, #{ fee })
INSERT INTO ORDERDETAIL (ORDERDETAILNO, ORDERID, PNO, AMOUNT) SELECT SEQ_ORDERDETAILNO.NEXTVAL, #{ orderid }, PNO, AMOUNT FROM CART
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE CARTUSERID = #{ orderuserid }
mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDERUSERID, O.TOTALPRICE, O.ORDERENROLL, O.RECEIVERNAME, P.PNAME, OD.ORDERID, (SELECT COUNT(*) -1 FROM ORDERDETAIL WHERE ORDERID = OD.ORDERID GROUP BY ORDERID) "CNT" FROM ORDERED O, ORDERDETAIL OD, PRODUCT P WHERE O.ORDERID = OD.ORDERID AND OD.PNO = P.PNO AND OD.ORDERDETAILNO IN (SELECT MIN(ORDERDETAILNO) FROM ORDERDETAIL GROUP BY ORDERID) AND P.PNAME = (SELECT MIN(PNAME) FROM PRODUCT P WHERE PNO = OD.PNO) AND ORDERUSERID = #{ orderuserid }

SELECT PA.CHANGENAME, P.PNAME, P.PPRICE, OD.PNO,OD.AMOUNT FROM ORDERDETAIL OD, PRODUCT P, PATTACHMENT PA WHERE PA.PNO = OD.PNO AND PA.PANO = (SELECT MIN(PANO) FROM PATTACHMENT WHERE PNO = OD.PNO) AND OD.PNO = P.PNO AND OD.ORDERID = #{ orderid }
